name: Arch-frost
body:
###Arch-Frost###

Arch-Frost is a custom Arch-blue Numix-Frost GTK theme with a whole new, custom gnome-shell theme to match.


You can download get the lastest complete version by downloading above, or if you want to keep up with all the latest changes as they're made, before a new version is released, you can clone the repo [https://github.com/osendott/arch-frost.git](https://github.com/osendott/arch-frost.git) and symlink or copy the appropriate folders to your "~/.themes" directory (or wherever your distro stores theme files)

If you have any comments or suggestions, feel free to e-mail me at the following address:
william.osendott[at]gmail[dot]com or if you're a GitHub user, clone the repo, make your changes, and submit a pull request.

If you experience any problems, please raise the issue on the GitHub page:
[https://github.com/osendott/arch-frost/issues](https://github.com/osendott/arch-frost/issues)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
